title: Participatory Dialogic Learning Program for Early Childhood Education Leadership Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of early childhood education principles and foundational leadership theories
context.additional_context: Science-based early childhood education leadership development program for educational institution administrators

learning_goals: Clearly define personal leadership identity in early childhood education settings through participatory dialogue
Propose collaborative solutions among peer leaders at least three times using social constructivist-based teaching methods
Develop a leadership implementation plan reflecting the educational context and submit execution results as a portfolio
Analyze positive change cases in early childhood institutions by applying an appreciative stance
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
